snippet.title: Sonic and the Mayhem Master - SAGE 2018 Trailer Clip
snippet.description:
Preparing for the main event. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Here's the clip from this year's SAGE trailer. I'll be very busy in finishing the game. Check out the Expo Trailer to see other games that got showcased; 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zHRKw8VPDmc

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
